meanings.sent1: The crotchety old man scowled at the noisy children playing outside.
meanings.sent2: She becomes crotchety when she doesn't get enough sleep.
meanings.sent3: The crotchety cat refused to share its favorite spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: His crotchety attitude was like a storm cloud on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The image of the crotchety neighbor yelling at passing cars stuck in everyone's minds.

meanings.definition: Given to odd notions, whims, or fancies
meanings.sent1: The crotchety inventor spent hours tinkering with his latest contraption.
meanings.sent2: Her crotchety taste in art always surprised her friends.
meanings.sent3: The crotchety idea of a talking dog made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His crotchety imagination led him to believe in magical creatures.
meanings.sent5: The crotchety dream of flying without wings fascinated the children.
